Text: Upcoming Events for Mrs Goldbergs Class Cc We want to remind you of a few upcoming events for your calendar Book Fair Oct th PM is Family Night Enjoy Mrs Nikkis delicious spaghetti dinner tickets must be purchased in advance and the opportunity to shop for books and CDs with your family Please feel free to join your children as their class attends the Book Fair on Oct th at PM They will have minutes to make a selection so it helps the hostshostesses to have a few extra hands Room Parent Meeting October nd The st grade room parents will be meeting with Kay Pickett next Monday Please let us know any concerns you may have so that we can share them with her We appreciate your feedback Halloween Party October st at PM Tracy Geaccone party chair will be contacting you shortly if you signed up to help with this event NASAAll Day Field Trip November th leave at AM Chaperones should meet in the lower school cafeteria NOT in the hallway at AM If you signed up as a chaperone Sheryl will be contacting you shortly with details Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns Thanks Sheryl Rapp and Julie McKay
